title: Crew of 8 illegally smol kittens stopped by Polish police for being too tiny and adorable, they get sentenced to a lifetime of snuggles and love without purrole
description: Howdy there, feline fam. Today we're here to talk about something serious, something… criminal. Yes, we're happy to report that your streets are safer tonight thanks to the trustworthy hands of our boys in blue. They rounded up some of the most miscreant, most devious, fluffiest criminals you have ever seen. And it wasn't just one of them, nor was it a crew of two. No, it was a team of 8 illegally smol kittens roaming your neighborhood causing mischief and mayhem wherever they went!Luckily, they were stopped by the pawlice for being too tiny and too adorable. They promptly rounded them up, brought them in the back of their car, and got them sentenced to a lifetime of snuggles and love without purrole. We can all sleep more soundly tonight knowing that these floofy deviants have loving hoomans watching over them all the time now. Not to mention the fact that they're all on house arrest! Scroll down to see the cutest mugshots you've ever seen below!Your inbox deserves hissterical cat content. We deliver. Weekly. Subscribe here.
author: Blake Seidel

html:
Howdy there, feline fam. Today we're here to talk about something serious, something… criminal. Yes, we're happy to report that your streets are safer tonight thanks to the trustworthy hands of our boys in blue. They rounded up some of the most miscreant, most devious, fluffiest criminals you have ever seen. And it wasn't just one of them, nor was it a crew of two. No, it was a team of 8 illegally smol kittens roaming your neighborhood causing mischief and mayhem wherever they went!

Luckily, they were stopped by the pawlice for being too tiny and too adorable. They promptly rounded them up, brought them in the back of their car, and got them sentenced to a lifetime of snuggles and love without purrole. We can all sleep more soundly tonight knowing that these floofy deviants have loving hoomans watching over them all the time now. Not to mention the fact that they're all on house arrest!
